title: Post Thanksgivng Church Complaints, Deontay Wilder, Sand and Soul, Southern Classic and more.
itunes:title: Post Thanksgivng Church Complaints, Deontay Wilder, Sand and Soul, Southern Classic and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The CEO is broadcasting from Abu Dhabi. Highly blessed and even more highly favored. We are grateful! Somebody ate duck inside Thanksgiving Weekend Review. Post Thanksgiving Church Complaints had some interesting requests. Sand and Soul 2020 goes back to the DR! In Entertainment News, the conversation goes from black movies to chicken in one second flat. The 2019 Bayou Classic was in NOLA and someone had it real bad in Trending Sports News. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about focusing on the positives and looking for the blessing, plus so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
